about_the_game:
Get ready for an adventure like no other with the third expansion of the Erannorth Chronicles - "Guilds and Secret Societies". This incredible expansion takes your gameplay to the next level with new Cards, Allies, Perks, and Contacts that will enrich your adventures and make them more exciting than ever before.

With over 320 new cards, you can recruit new allies and explore exciting new mechanics that will take your gameplay to new heights. The addition of over 100 new NPCs means you can learn new skills and even purchase cards from their organization if you're a member - talk about insider perks!

Face over 85 unique and deadly enemies, each with their own deadly tactic cards, to keep your higher-level campaigns lethal and challenging. Plus, with over 25 new epic-level quest chains, each with exclusive rewards that you can't get anywhere else in the world, you're in for an adventure that will keep you on the edge of your seat.

But that's not all - "Guilds and Secret Societies" also brings you four new arenas and a new endgame challenge that will put your skills to the test. Suitable for epic-level characters, this new challenge is the ultimate test of your mettle.

And let's not forget the new crafting recipes and blacksmiths that allow you to create new clockworks in your workshop, raise undead minions in your necromantic altar, and upgrade your equipment to the next level of rarity for a fee.

So, are you ready to take Erannorth to the next level and embark on an unforgettable adventure with "Guilds and Secret Societies"?
detailed_description:
Disclaimer

DLCs for Erannorth progressively increase the game's complexity and difficulty and aren't recommended to own before you are familiar with the base game. If you try to decide which to get between the available DLCs, I would advise getting them in release order for a smoother transition in Difficulty and Complexity.
